name: Music_5060.wav
caption: This is a techno music piece played in the background of a car video. The sounds coming from the car such as the exhaust sound can be heard in the video. The electronic music piece consists of a crisp synth sound playing a repeated theme while there is an electronic drum beat in the rhythmic background. There is an aggressive atmosphere in the piece. Samples lifted from the track could be used in the soundtrack of a car racing video game.
